## Ivo Alves CV

### Professional Experience ###

* __Software developer @ Miniclip SA__ - Technically responsible for supporting and improving the internal codebase libraries.
* __Software developer @ Indot Studio__ - Unity game developer, creating and testing prototypes.


### Academic Progress ###

* __Digital Game Development Engineering__ - Instituto Politécnico do Cávado e do Ave (Barcelos, Portugal)
* __Bachelor of Design and Multimedia__ - Universidade de Coimbra (Coimbra, Portugal) (first year only)
